items.sentence: Tom still doesn't have his own apartment, even though he is already thirty. He still lives with his parents.
With a little bit of hesitation, Tom stepped into the van and pulled a wad of cash out of his jacket pocket.
Electric motors deliver strong acceleration because they offer more torque than equivalent gasoline engines.
Tom is respected in the business community because he is always fair and square in his dealings with others.
Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a hang glider or a speedboat, which is good enough for me.
